definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: 'I am, ' replied the Doger. 'I'd scorn to be anything else.
sentences.chinese: “是啊，”机灵鬼答道，“别的行当我还瞧不上呢。”

sentences.english: She is doing fine in her new business.
sentences.chinese: 她在新行当里干得很不错。

sentences.english: Acting is definitely a young person's profession in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 从许多方面来说，表演无疑是吃青春饭的行当。

sentences.english: ‘You’re a washerwoman to your trade, says you. Very well, that’s that.
sentences.chinese: 你说你是干洗衣这行当的，那很好。

sentences.english: The accounting profession is a sword.
sentences.chinese: 会计这行当就像一把剑。

sentences.english: A new competitor seemed to emerge out of the woodwork every month or so.
sentences.chinese: 大约每个月都有一个新的竞争对手加入这个行当。

sentences.english: He's up to his old tricks, I'll bet.
sentences.chinese: 我可以打赌，他又干起老行当来了。

sentences.english: Hualian, also known as jing, is a major role in China’s theatrical performing tradition.
sentences.chinese: “花脸”，又称为“净”，是戏曲表演中的一个行当。

sentences.english: Hualian, also known as jing, is a major role in China's theatrical performing tradition.
sentences.chinese: “花脸”，又称为“净”，是戏曲表演中的一个行当。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, catching turtles to sell to Zhao Chun became a local specialty.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，为赵春捉龟似乎成了当地的一种行当。

sentences.english: And only when it becomes unprofitable will it stop.
sentences.chinese: 只有当这个行当赚不到什么钱了，它才会停止。

definition: all the trades/people of all trades and professions
to make a living as a traveling performer etc
switch to a job one was not trained for
different trades, worlds apart (idiom); to sb outside the profession, it is a closed book
to totally stop doing something/to reform one's ways
